entries.title: On Musk's Twitter, users looking to sell and trade child sex abuse material are still easily found
entries.description: Elon Musk has said he wants to make cracking down on child exploitation his number one priority at Twitter. A review of tweets suggests there's a lot of work to do.

entries.title: A fake tweet spurred an anti-vaccine harassment campaign against a doctor
entries.description: When Dr. Natalia Solenkova woke up Monday morning, she was greeted with a flood of Twitter notifications on her phone.

entries.title: Al Roker returns to 'TODAY' after two months
entries.description: Al Roker returned to "TODAY" on Friday after two months away, and he was in great spirits as he joined Savannah Guthrie and Hoda Kotb.
